description: '''Romy Flores''' (born December 19, 1999), known professionally as '''DeathbyRomy''', is an American singer-songwriter. Born and raised in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]], she began performing music professionally at age 15. Since her debut LP ''Monsters'' came out in 2018, Flores has released three studio albums, with the most recent one being 2022's ''Entropy''. She is most known for her 2019 single "Problems", amassing over 60 million streams on [[Spotify]] following its success on the video-hosting service [[TikTok]].
